articles.author: Rebekah Valentine
articles.title: Microsoft Becomes the Second-Ever $3 Trillion-Dollar Company After Laying Off 1900 People - IGN
articles.description: Microsoft has become the second company ever to achieve a $3 trillion market valuation, closing at the market cap for the first time today just after it laid of 1900 workers from its gaming divisions.
articles.content: Microsoft has become the second company ever to achieve a $3 trillion market valuation, closing at the market cap for the first time today just after it laid of 1900 workers from its gaming divisions… [+1763 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Franklin
articles.title: JPMorgan's leadership shuffle positions potential Dimon successors - Financial Times
articles.description: Jennifer Piepszak, Marianne Lake and Troy Rohrbaugh take on new responsibilities in consolidated businesses
articles.content:
JPMorgan Chase chief executive Jamie Dimon has shuffled his leadership team and consolidated some of the banks businesses, grooming potential candidates who could eventually take over from him.
